system.effect: Character selects one of their allies they can see. If the Character has previously devoured a member of the target's race they can make a +0 Scrutiny Test as a Half Action. If successful they determine the number of Wounds the target possesses and a number of the target's Characteristics equal to the degrees of success on the Scrutiny Test of their choice. Can be done once per target per encounter.
